title: Raising cybersecurity awareness is good for everyone - but it needs to be done better
description: October is cybersecurity awareness month. But to keep people and networks safe, employees need advice all year round - and it can't be done with fear.

title: The 5 best Raspberry Pi alternatives of 2022
description: Here's everything you need to know about non-Pi single-board computers. We analyzed RAM, flash, storage, and more to find the best Raspberry Pi alternatives.

title: Southwest Airlines has a new idea for customers. Some are already angry about it
description: Oh, this won't please everyone. But when can you ever please everyone?
